abstract.text: Learn how to migrate from a paid-up-front app to the Freemium model using FreemiumKit in 3 simple steps, while preserving access to your app for those who already purchased.

content.text: Step 1: Set up FreemiumKit like normally

inlineContent.text: Add your app inside the FreemiumKit app and follow all instructions to set up your app for In-App Purchases like you would normally do (see Setup tab inside the Mac app). Just act like your app is already free to use and make sure to lock any features you want to hide behind paid tiers using the SDK features from our
